readingText.content:
Emma and Jake were walking home from school when they noticed something strange. A boy was sitting on a bench in the park, looking worried. He kept checking his phone and looking around.

"What’s wrong?" Emma asked. “My backpack is gone! I was listening to music and texting my mum. When I looked up, it wasn’t there!” the boy said.

Jake and Emma looked around. The park was quiet. A few people were jogging and an old man was feeding birds. Jake thought for a moment. “You were listening to music and texting … so you weren’t looking. Maybe someone took it while you weren’t paying attention!”

Suddenly, they heard a woman shouting, “Leave it! Leave it!” …

instruction.german: Read the beginning of the story The missing backpack and write what happens next (60–80 words). Use the questions below to help you.

parts:
• Who was the woman shouting?
  • Who was she talking to?
  • What did Emma and Jake do to help?
  • What did the boy say to the woman? 
  • How did the boy feel in the end?
